vecHighlight.strDescription: You became friends with Whirlwind, the Donkey.
You became a Keeper of the Holy Order.
You let the Master Skull harmonize your chakras. Namaste!
You convinced Mirell to ease his daughter's suffering.
You acquired and wore a complete set.
You engaged in a profound discussion about art and poetry with Prince Mith.

vecHighlight.strName: Lyrical Outpours and Other Bodily Fluids
vecHighlight.strDescription: You read an analysis of Prince Mith's poetry. And got educated.

vecUnachieved.strDescription: You proved yourself both dextrous and athletic by tricking the Starling lock mechanism on your first try.
You bought yourself a home in Ark.
You combined two synergetic classes and unlocked an affinity.
You bound a lost soul into a Phasmalist's trinket.
You found all hidden stashes in the orphanage.
You suffered through Enderal's rendition of the arrow in the knee joke. You knew this was coming.
You flew on a Myrad's back for twenty times.
You brewed and drank your first Wolf's Blood potion.

vecAchievedHidden.strDescription: You convinced Mirell to ease his daughter's suffering.

data.strFullDescription:
Enderal: Forgotten Stories (Special Edition) is a total conversion mod for Skyrim SE, which is now running on the 64 bit version of the [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/489830/The_Elder_Scrolls_V_Skyrim_Special_Edition/]TES V: Skyrim Special Edition[/url]. This version benefits heavily from the new rendering engine and features improved lighting effects, smoother image quality and the best possible performance & stability.

Enderal is a game modification that is set in its own world with its own landscape, lore and story. It offers an immersive open world, all for the player to explore, overhauled skill systems and gameplay mechanics and a dark, psychological storyline with believable characters.

Enderal is free and can be played by anyone owning a legal copy of TES V: Skyrim Special Edition. It is developed non-commercially by SureAI, the team behind the renowned Oblivion mod [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1014940/Nehrim_At_Fates_Edge/]Nehrim: At Fate´s Edge[/url] (and various other projects).
data.strSnippet: Enderal: Forgotten Stories (Special Edition) is a total conversion mod for Skyrim SE. It offers an immersive open world, new skill systems and gameplay with a dark, psychological storyline and believable characters. SE features a new rendering engine, improved lighting, performance and stability.
